name: Game-of-life
body:
Game-of-Life
============
A very simple version of Conway's Game of Life, just created as a fun side project to learn about cellular automation and mess around.

If it piques my interest again, I may add some more interesting features, but for now it lays in the pile of work I'm bored with.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
